name: Animalia - The Quiz Game
description: Animalia - The Quiz Game is mostly ahm.. a quiz game! We'll show you a photo of an animal and you need to get the name right. By doing so, bing!, you'll go into the next level and repeat the process until you beat the game! You'll know more animals than before, guaranteed!
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-Bit Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 120 MB available space
